Platform sandals in imitation suede with open toes and an adjustable heel strap with a metal buckle at one side. Imitation leather linings and insoles. Platform 4 cm. Heel 11 cm.
Cropped top in jersey crêpe with a deep V-neck, drawstring down the front for a draped effect and short, wide sleeves.

Cropped top in crinkled jersey that can be worn as an off-the-shoulder top with a square neckline and short puff sleeves. Narrow elastication and a small frill trim at the top and around the sleeves and hem.

KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Dress in textured, double-weave organic cotton with adjustable straps that have a decorative knot at the front, cross at the back and fasten with a button. Seam at the waist with elastication at the back. Unlined.
Shirt in imitation leather with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front and a double-layered yoke at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Brushed inside.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist, ties at the sides and medium coverage at the back.

Blouse in an airy weave with a stand-up collar and gathers at the top both front and back to create soft draping. Opening at the back with buttons at the back of the neck, long balloon sleeves with close-fitting, buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.

Footless tights with stirrups.
Patterned tights with an elasticated waist.

Blouse in a textured cotton weave with embroidery on the front, a small, gathered stand-up collar and a V-shaped opening with twisted ties that have pompom-decorated tassels. Long raglan sleeves with seams and pleats, and narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs.
EMMA JAYNE x H&M. Patterned bikini. Top with a flounce at the top that continues over one shoulder and a narrow strap over the other shoulder. Matching bottoms with a lined gusset.

Shirt in lightweight twill made from a Tencel™ lyocell and cotton blend with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a pleat and button, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Sandals in shimmering metallic imitation leather. Adjustable ankle straps with concealed elastication and a metal buckle, block heels and a welt seam around the soles. Imitation leather insoles. Heel 7.5 cm.
Sleeveless dress in tulle with sequined embroidery and floral appliqués. Buttons at the back, a seam at the waist and a flared, glittery skirt in two layers of tulle. Lined.
Waist belt in imitation leather with wrapover straps at the front and elastic with a metal fastener at the back. Width approx. 6 cm.

Suit trousers in an airy linen and cotton weave with an elasticated waist, hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Diagonal side pockets and welt back pockets. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Fitted, long-sleeved top in ribbed cotton jersey with a V-neck and drawstring down the front that ties at the hem.
Fitted, long-sleeved top in ribbed cotton jersey with a V-neck and drawstring down the front that ties at the hem.
Fitted, long-sleeved body in ribbed jersey with a round neck and cut-out section at the back. Concealed press-studs at the crotch, high cut legs and a high cut at the back.
Fitted, long-sleeved body in ribbed jersey with a round neck and cut-out section at the back. Concealed press-studs at the crotch, high cut legs and a high cut at the back.
Metal chain belt with several strands at the front, a decorative pendant at one end and a fastening with a carabiner hook at the other. Length approx. 114cm.
Metal chain belt with several strands at the front, a decorative pendant at one end and a fastening with a carabiner hook at the other. Length approx. 114cm.
Sleeveless romper suit in soft, organic cotton slub jersey with buttons on the shoulders, press-studs at the crotch and short legs.
Sleeveless romper suit in soft, organic cotton slub jersey with buttons on the shoulders, press-studs at the crotch and short legs.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, zipped side pockets and gently tapered legs with ribbed hems.
DESMOND & DEMPSEY x H&M. Short, V-neck dress in an airy linen and viscose weave with gathered shoulder seams, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.

KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Hairbands in a braided cotton weave with covered elastication at the back.
Fitted vest top in microfibre designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.

Knee-length dress in a softly draping weave with a slight sheen. Opening and button at the back of the neck and short sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs. Concealed zip in one side, a seam and detachable tie belt at the waist and a softly draping, flared skirt. Unlined.

Knee-length dress in a softly draping weave with a slight sheen. Opening and button at the back of the neck and short sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs. Concealed zip in one side, a seam and detachable tie belt at the waist and a softly draping, flared skirt. Unlined.

Calf-length dress in softly draping, lightly crêped satin with a boat neck and a concealed zip in one side. Seam at the waist with a detachable tie belt and a flared, pleated skirt. Unlined. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.

Fitted, knee-length lace dress with a round neckline at the front and a deep V-neck and concealed zip at the back. Cap sleeves, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt with a scalloped hem. Lined.
Short-sleeved top in soft jersey made from a cotton and modal blend.
Short-sleeved top in soft jersey made from a cotton and modal blend.

Short dress in an airy weave made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend containing some linen. Stand-up collar with a V-shaped opening and wide ties at the front. Wide, 3/4-length raglan sleeves, narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning, and a gathered seam at the hem for added width.

Oversized jacket in washed cotton denim with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, flap front pockets with a button and side pockets. Covered elastication at the back of the hem.
Knee-length dress in satin with a V-neck opening and narrow ties at the front, cap sleeves, an elasticated seam at the waist and softly draping skirt. Unlined.

Dungarees in washed, slightly stretchy cotton twill with frills at the top and adjustable straps with metal fasteners. Press-studs at the sides, a regular waist, fake fly, front and back pockets and gently tapered legs.
Calf-length skirt in a softly draping viscose weave. High, frill-trimmed waist with covered elastication and decorative buttons at the front, and side pockets. Longer at the back. Unlined.

Trousers in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with an elasticated waist, pockets in the side seams, a back pocket and elasticated hems. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the sweatpants is organic.
